relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Rock Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant, stockholm rock roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.

relproducts.title: Words Summer - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The fun, alphabet sprinkled words summer is a bold, funky choice for your home, and you'll find yourself absentmindedly creating words from nowhere. The bright lime and vivid yellow are tempered by the subtle dove grey, and placed on an off-white background fabric that allows light to filter through at will. Use the summer in a family dining room to add fun and games to dinnertime, or hang in a child's bedroom to get them learning the alphabet without even thinking about it.

relproducts.title: Seasons Summer Roller Blind

relproducts.title: Summer Trail Essential - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: We love the relaxed pace of life that comes hand in hand with country living, which is probably why summer trail essential caught the eye the moment we saw it. The florals are elegant and enjoyable - two things that we all hope for from their new look interiors. If you want to be able to celebrate the way in which the light enters the living room, you need a roller blind that brings everything together in perfect harmony.

relproducts.title: Tranquil Summer - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Delicate water-paint florals set a beautifully peaceful scene on the tranquil summer, with pretty wildflowers in rich purples, deep pinks, and pale lilacs. The cream, light-filtering backdrop has a near translucent feel, perfect for watching the light trickle through on a sunny day. The summer will add delicacy and charm to a country kitchen, where it can sit elegantly amongst light cream walls and units, accented by pinks and purples to bring out the gorgeous hues in this attractive blind.
